targets.expr: sum (redis_db_keys{instance=~"$instance", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) by (instance) - sum (redis_db_keys_expiring{instance=~"$instance", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}) by (instance)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
list.label: 集群
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
